About.title: About Travel Buddy
About.passage_one: Travel Buddy is a young and dynamic DMC in Vietnam founded in September 2023, primarily operating in international and domestic travel and tourism services.
About.passage_two: We possess a young, sensitive workforce with current trends and high expertise, so we are poised to offer more engaging and fulfilling travel experiences than ever.

our_service.title: What you can expect from us

BlogList.title: Travel Buddy Blog
BlogList.explore: Discover the thrill of your next adventure! Gather inspiration, pack your luggage, gain valuable experiences, and update your information to transform your upcoming trips into unforgettable journeys!

OurSustainabilityMission.title: OUR SUSTAINABILITY MISSION
OurSustainabilityMission.passage_one: Everyone has their dreamland, and Travel Buddy is no exception.
OurSustainabilityMission.passage_two: With a strong desire to create a dreamland filled with wonderful experiences for our customers, employees, partners, and the community, the "Road to the Dreamland" fund was found.
OurSustainabilityMission.passage_three: "Road to the Dreamland" is a fund allocated by Travel Buddy from a portion of our business profits for CSR (Corporate Social Responsibility) programs. Each year, this fund will be utilized to execute charity programs or contribute to environmental protection, sustainable economic development, and more.

Best_seller_tours.title: BEST SELLER TOURS
Best_seller_tours.description: Find your place on the coast, in the mountain or in the city.
